item.title: Publishing website using Hugo and Github Pages
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to host your website using Hugo and Github Pages. Github pages allows you to host static content directly via repository in github. Hugo Installation Open your terminal, run the following command-line one by one: 1 brew install hugo To check whether you installed Hugo successfully, enter the following into your terminal 1 hugo version Here is output will look like
